src.NN.BatchManager module

src.NN.BatchManager.Files_in_dir(dir_path: str, mask: str = '')

Returns a list of names of all files in alphabetical order containing mask in the name

Parameters:

  • dir_path (str) – Folder name

  • mask (str) – Filter in the file name

Return type:

List of names

src.NN.BatchManager.LoadBatch(path: str, name: str)

Loads two numpy arrays saved by the SaveBatch function

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Folder path

  • name (str) – File name, for example, 1.npz

Returns:

Two numpy arrays

Return type:

image and target

src.NN.BatchManager.LoadMultipleBatches(path: str, names: List[str])

Loads 2 * len(names) numpy arrays saved by the SaveBatch function

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Folder path

  • name (list) – list of names, e.g. [“1.npz”, “2.npz”]

Return type:

Two numpy arrays images and targets

src.NN.BatchManager.Open_Images(path: str, names: List[str])

Opens a list of images

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Folder path

  • names (list) – Names of image files

Return type:

Image list

src.NN.BatchManager.SaveBatch(x: ndarray, y: ndarray, path: str, name: List[str])

Stores two numpy arrays

Parameters:

  • x (image) –

  • y (target) –

  • path (str) – Folder path

  • name (str) – File name, for example, 1.npz

src.NN.BatchManager.natural_sorting(arr: List[str])

Sorts according to the order of the numbers

Parameters:

arr (array of strings) –

Return type:
